ComicInfo.Title: Cobra Civil War Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: With Cobra Commander deceased, long live Cobra Commander, but what everyone wants to know is, who will be the new Cobra Commander? The role must be filled and the deadliest and sneakiest Cobra elite will compete to become the new ruler. The deciding factor will be whoever kills the most G.I. Joes!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 17:41:40. [CVDB269963]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Javier Saltares, Nelson Daniel, Zach Howard
ComicInfo.Editor: Andy Schmidt, Carlos Guzman, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Helix, Baroness, Blacklight, COBRA Viper, Dial Tone, Duke, Krake, Leatherneck, Mainframe, Major Bludd, Recondo, Scarlett, Snake Eyes, Stalker, Storm Shadow, Tomax, Tripwire, Zartan
ComicInfo.Teams: COBRA, Crimson Guardsmen, G.I. Joe, Vipers
